meanings.sent1: She felt special being preinvited to the party.
meanings.sent2: The preinvited guests received their invitations a week early.
meanings.sent3: The preinvited guests were thrilled to be included in the exclusive event.
meanings.sent4: Being preinvited made her feel like a VIP.
meanings.sent5: The preinvited guests were the first to know about the exciting news.

meanings.definition: To have been asked to attend an event before it occurs.
meanings.sent1: He preinvited his close friends to the movie premiere.
meanings.sent2: They preinvited her to the concert next month.
meanings.sent3: The magician preinvited the audience to his next show.
meanings.sent4: She preinvited him to her birthday celebration.
meanings.sent5: The club preinvited its members to the annual gala.
